name: SolTrans: Paratransit
description: Door-to-door transit in Vallejo and Benicia
fullDescription: SolTrans provides ADA paratransit service for Vallejo and Benicia residents who cannot use regular bus service due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service in Vallejo and Benicia
- Advance reservations required
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the paratransit eligibility application
2. Application at soltrans.org
3. Assessment may be required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
